entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navbar title color differs on Android and Windows #6761
  • PushModal on Windows does not show back button #6760
  • Error running an iOS Native View #6757
  • "requestLayout() improperly called" warnings spamming output #6755
  • Error In reading and writing file in Android Emulator and windows from Maui project. #6754
  • Android : Resources/appicon.svg cannot be moved to Resources/Images/appicon.svg #6753
  • TabbedPage Indicates Multiple Item Selection #6751
  • Fix timing issue on iOS with setting Accessibility Traits #6750
    .NET 7
  • Shell does not provide way to change toolbar properties such as font weight, size, family, alignment, background color, etc. #6748
  • .NET MAUI Shell - TabBar - Tab IsVisible property binding not working properly on Windows platform #6746
  • Working alternative for PlatformImage for Maui.Graphics.IImage for Windows? #6742
  • Shell Tabbed App - can't change color for items placed in more items menu #6740
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Change the flyout icon color #6738
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Wrong underline under TitleView on iOS #6735
    6.0.300
  • Shell FlyoutContent wrong position on iOS #6734
  • Switching language on Android results in a crash while navigating if resource manager used (i18n) #6732
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC2 - The Grid keeps a height and width at 0 ignoring FillAndExpand #6731
    6.0.300
  • Element Effect does't aply first time (some initialization issue) #6729
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Enabling CheckBox does not change visual state #6727
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Simplify Grid definitions, with VerticalGrid and HorizontalGrid #6726

Closed

  • Data entry field tracking list has wrong BindingContext value #5437
    6.0.300
  • [Enhancement] Provide Shell.TitleBarIsVisible #6679
  • [Android] Gesture issue in Tab pages #4979
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Horizontal CollectionView not rendering #4015
    6.0.300
  • Unable to render online image using XAML Image control #6634
  • MAUI clearing storage of app #6641
  • Bindable FlexLayout not sized and visible on Windows #3475
    6.0.300
  • MAUI Blazor Windows Executables Broken ('Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll') #6744
  • [Bug] CollectionView.EmptyView does not render on android #3012
    6.0.300
  • NavigationPage.SetTitleView not rendering properly on Android #6495
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] <CollectionView.Footer> in connection with <SearchBar> #6672
  • [Android] <CollectionView.EmptyView> in connection with <SearchBar> #6671
  • ContentView does not respect IsClippedToBounds (does not clip children) #6656
  • [Android][WSA] PresentationMode=Modal in Shell with rendering problem of statusbar #6745
  • ¤ Target current Blazor web app to windows and android #6704
  • OnIdiom issue with Windows #5014
    6.0.300
  • FontImageSource is not displayed on Android, works in Windows. #6693
  • Custom font cannot work for Android on RC2 #6712
  • [Question] async void in MAUI Essentials samples #6655
  • [Android] Remove all uses of Styleable arrays inside the .NET MAUI code #4889
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Crash using a CollectionView inside a RefreshView #4114
    6.0.300
  • Failed to connect to localhost/127.0.0.1:7020 #6705
  • Clipping is still not working #6260
    6.0.300
  • Delete overlapping ColorExtension properties from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.iOS #4601
  • AVCaptureDevice.DevicesWithMediaType(AVMediaTypes.Video.ToString()); returns null #6728
  • App Crash From Multiple Theme Switches #5848
    6.0.300
  • Grid Column and RowSpacing don't display in the colour of its parent #4946
    6.0.300
  • [Blazor] libman libraries not included in first build #6709
  • Improve the Migration guide #6724
  • MAUI - Publish brand new project produces errors #6719
  • FlyoutPage Navigation Pane #6157
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix margin related measuring with CV #6762
  • Fix various measure/layout issues with android flyout #6759
    area/layout 🔲
  • Revert "Add VC Redist dependency to Windows templates" #6758
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁
  • Android WebAuthenticator fallback to system browser if Chrome Custom tabs are not available #6743
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Ensure glide targets run once #6739
    area/setup 🪄
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 117.0.0 to 118.0.2 #6737
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22229.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22230.1 #6736
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Register for page selected ViewPager2 #6696
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix issue with View as EmptyView of CollectionView #6756
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Only set AccessibilityTraits for heading when it matters #6749
    area/a11y
  • Clean up the windows code a bit #6501
    platform/windows 🪟, area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix Newtonsoft.Json assembly version conflict warning in Resizetizer.UnitTests.csproj #6741
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Exclude platform-specific items using metadata #6681
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [Android] Fix usage of SimpleViewHolder on COllectionView Header and Footer #6682
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove remaining asserts from PR 6237 #6686
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix Opacity for Wrapper Views #6711
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Update the adapter used by RecyclerViewScrollListener #6601
    area/collectionview 📃, partner/android, 6.0.300
